pesticide.PPE: To prevent contact, workers mixing solution and handling treated flowers and potted plants must wear waterproof gloves, covering hands, wrists and lower forearms, waterproof apron, long-sleeved shirt and long pants, socks and shoes. Follow the manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE. If no such instructions for washables, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION: Harmful if swallowed or absorbed through skin. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
